snippet: The move came after several years of bitter debate, signaling the latest shift in a state that was once seen as hostile toward gays and lesbians.
abstract: Colorado lawmakers pass legislation to legalize civil unions for same-sex couples.
lead_paragraph: The move came after several years of bitter debate, signaling the latest shift in a state that was once seen as hostile toward gays and lesbians.

headline.seo: Colorado Legalizes Civil Unions for Same-Sex Couples
